name: DIGGIN'
description:
Explore the world below the surface of Giza, Egypt. Guided by mr. Dickens you must combine aim, agility and will power to earn as much cash as possible before time gets the best of you. 

The soil is filled with hidden treasures. Some say that the Egyptians were a bit ahead of their time in that regard... 

Made in 48-hours by Asbjørn Thirslund - Brackeys.

Tools: 

  • Unity 5.4 (C#) 
  • Visual Studio 
  • Photoshop CC 
  • Adobe Audition 
  • Bosca Ceoil
